rows:
MTReleaseNumber 0
MTVersion 7.0
PluginSchemaVersion WidgetManager=1.1
PluginSchemaVersion formattedtext=1.00
PluginSchemaVersion multiblog=2.8
SchemaVersion 7.0021
Can upload files, edit all entries(categories), pages(folders), tags and publish the site.
Can create entries, edit their own entries, upload files and publish.
Can edit, manage, and publish blog templates and themes.
Can manage pages, upload files and publish site/child site templates.
Can create entries, edit their own entries, and comment.
Can manage content types, content data, edit their own content types, content data.

<mt:SetVarBlock name="message">If this was an error, you can unblock the IP address and allow the visitor to add it again by logging in to your Movable Type installation, choosing Blog Config - IP Banning, and deleting the IP address <$mt:Var name="throttled_ip"$> from the list of banned addresses.</mt:SetVarBlock>
A visitor to your blog <$mt:BlogName$> has automatically been banned by adding more than the allowed number of comments in the last <$mt:Var name="throttle_seconds"$> seconds.

This was done to prevent a malicious script from overwhelming your weblog with comments. The banned IP address is

<$mt:Var name="throttled_ip"$>

<$mt:Var name="message"$>

This email is to notify you that an IP address has been locked out.

IP Address: <mt:var name="ip_address"> 
Recovery: <mt:Date ts="$recovery_time">

<mt:include module="Mail Footer">

<mt:If name="unapproved" trim="1">
  <mt:If name="entry_id">
    <mt:If tag="EntryClass" eq="entry">
      An unapproved TrackBack has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on entry #<$mt:EntryID$> (<$mt:EntryTitle$>). You need to approve this TrackBack before it will appear on your site.
    <mt:Else>
      An unapproved TrackBack has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on page #<$mt:PageID$> (<$mt:PageTitle$>). You need to approve this TrackBack before it will appear on your site.
    </mt:If>
  <mt:ElseIf name="category_id">
    An unapproved TrackBack has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on category #<$mt:CategoryID$>, (<$mt:CategoryLabel$>). You need to approve this TrackBack before it will appear on your site.
  </mt:If>
<mt:Else>
  <mt:If name="entry_id">
    <mt:If tag="EntryClass" eq="entry">
      A new TrackBack has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on entry #<$mt:EntryID$> (<$mt:EntryTitle$>).
    <mt:Else>
      A new TrackBack has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on page #<$mt:PageID$> (<$mt:PageTitle$>).
    </mt:If>
  <mt:ElseIf name="category_id">
    A new TrackBack has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on category #<$mt:CategoryID$> (<$mt:CategoryLabel$>).
  </mt:If>
</mt:If>

Excerpt: 
<$mt:PingExcerpt wrap_text="72"$>

URL: <$mt:PingURL$>
Title: <$mt:PingTitle$>
Blog: <$mt:PingBlogName$>
IP address: <$mt:PingIP$>

<mt:If name="state_editable"><mt:If name="unapproved">Approve TrackBack: 
  <<$mt:Var name="approve_url"$>>
</mt:If></mt:If>
<mt:If name="entry_id"><mt:If tag="EntryPermalink">View TrackBack: 
  <<$mt:EntryPermalink$>>
</mt:If></mt:If>
<mt:If name="state_editable">Report TrackBack as spam: 
  <<$mt:Var name="spam_url"$>>
</mt:If>
Edit TrackBack: 
  <<$mt:Var name="edit_url"$>>

<$mt:Include module="Mail Footer"$>

A request was made to change your Movable Type password. To complete this process click on the link below to select a new password.

<mt:var name="link_to_login">

If you did not request this change, you can safely ignore this email.

<mt:include module="Mail Footer">

This email is to notify you that a new user has successfully registered on the blog '<$mt:BlogName$>'. Here is some information about this new user.

New User Information:
Username: <$mt:CommenterUsername$> 
Full Name: <$mt:CommenterName$>
Email: <$mt:CommenterEmail$>

To view or edit this user, please click on or cut and paste the following URL into a web browser:
<$mt:Var name="profile_url"$>

<$mt:Include module="Mail Footer"$>

This email is to notify you that a Movable Type user account has been locked out.

Username: <mt:AuthorName> 
Display Name: <mt:AuthorDisplayName>
Email: <mt:AuthorEmail>

If you want to permit this user to participate again, click the link below.

<mt:var name="recover_lockout_link">

<mt:include module="Mail Footer">

<mt:If name="unapproved" trim="1">
    <mt:If tag="EntryClass" eq="entry">
        An unapproved comment has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on entry #<$mt:EntryID$> (<$mt:EntryTitle$>). You need to approve this comment before it will appear on your site.
    <mt:Else>
        An unapproved comment has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on page #<$mt:PageID$> (<$mt:PageTitle$>). You need to approve this comment before it will appear on your site.
    </mt:If>
<mt:Else>
    <mt:If tag="EntryClass" eq="entry">
        A new comment has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on entry #<$mt:EntryID$> (<$mt:EntryTitle$>).
    <mt:Else>
        A new comment has been posted on your site '<$mt:BlogName$>', on page #<$mt:PageID$> (<$mt:PageTitle$>).
    </mt:If>
</mt:If>

<$mt:CommentBody remove_html="1" wrap_text="72"$>

Commenter name: <$mt:CommentAuthor$> 
Commenter email address: <$mt:CommentEmail$>
Commenter URL: <$mt:CommentURL$>
Commenter IP address: <$mt:CommentIP$>

<mt:If name="unapproved"><mt:If name="state_editable">Approve comment:
    <<$mt:Var name="approve_url"$>></mt:If></mt:If>
<mt:If name="view_url">View comment:
    <<$mt:Var name="view_url" escape="html"$>></mt:If>
Edit comment:
    <<$mt:Var name="edit_url"$>>
<mt:If name="state_editable">Report the comment as spam:
    <<$mt:Var name="spam_url"$>></mt:If>

<$mt:Include module="Mail Footer"$>

Thank you for registering an account to comment on <$mt:BlogName$>. 

For your security and to prevent fraud, we ask you to confirm your account and email address before continuing. Once your account is confirmed, you will immediately be allowed to comment on <$mt:BlogName$>.

To confirm your account, please click on the following URL, or cut and paste this URL into a web browser:

<$mt:Var name="confirm_url"$>

If you did not make this request, or you don't want to register for an account to comment on <$mt:BlogName$>, then no further action is required.

Sincerely,
<mt:If tag="AuthorDisplayName"><$mt:AuthorDisplayName encode_html="1"$><mt:Else>Movable Type</mt:If>

<$mt:Include module="Mail Footer"$>

A new <$mt:entryclasslabel$> entitled '<$mt:EntryTitle$>' has been published to <$mt:BlogName$>.

<mt:If name="object_type" eq="entry">View entry:<mt:Else>View page:</mt:If> <<mt:SetVarBlock name="entry_status"><$mt:EntryStatus$></mt:SetVarBlock><mt:If name="entry_status" eq="Publish"><$mt:EntryPermalink$><mt:Else><$mt:Var name="entry_editurl"$></mt:If>>

------------------------------------------------------------------------
<$mt:EntryClassLabel lower_case="1"$> Title: <$mt:EntryTitle$>
Publish Date: <$mt:EntryDate mail="1"$>
<mt:If name="send_excerpt">

<$mt:EntryExcerpt wrap_text="72"$>
</mt:If>
------------------------------------------------------------------------

<mt:If name="message">Message from Sender:
<$mt:Var name="message"$></mt:If>
<mt:If name="send_body">
------------------------------------------------------------------------

<$mt:EntryBody remove_html="1" wrap_text="72"$>

------------------------------------------------------------------------</mt:If>

You are receiving this email either because you have elected to receive notifications about new content on <$mt:BlogName$>, or the author of the post thought you would be interested. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, please contact the following person:

<mt:if name="entry_author"><$mt:AuthorDisplayName$> <<$mt:AuthorEmail$>><mt:else><$mt:var name="from_address"$></mt:if>
